subject: Re: User email address enumeration vulnerability on upload.ee
bodyHtml:
Just did a check on facebook.com and instagram.com: trying to use existing email in signup process gave very clear response that email is in use by existing account. I would assume that Facebook and Microsoft are quite up to date about how exactly GDPR applies to email existence checking and displaying when real user is interacting with site.

For real user detection we use google recaptcha, not some self-made solution.

Regards,
Indrek
